articles.author: Michael Kosnar, Ryan J. Reilly
articles.title: Key participant in 2012 Benghazi attack has been brought to U.S. to face charges, DOJ says - NBC News
articles.description: A key participant in the 2012 attack on a U.S. diplomatic mission in the Libyan city of Benghazi that killed four Americans has been taken into custody and is facing charges in the U.S., Justice Department officials said Friday.

articles.author: Meredith Lee Hill, Mia McCarthy
articles.title: House Republicans prepare full-court press for voting restrictions - Politico
articles.description: The SAVE America Act, up for a vote next week in the House, has been a rare rallying point for a divided GOP.
articles.content: The issue almost tanked a massive government funding package this week and threatened to extend a four-day partial government shutdown until Trump intervened and ordered House Republicans to pass the… [+6028 chars]
